summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of rebuilt Narvo UI with Swiss Grid design system. Loading screen, landing page, and dashboard functionality all working excellently. New design implementation is visually stunning and fully functional.
passed_tests: Loading screen displays with perfect grid overlay (6x6 grid)
Loading screen animations: scanning line effect, breathing grid, pulse indicators
Loading screen transitions to landing page after ~3.5 seconds as expected
Landing page Swiss Grid design with correct colors (#1B211A background verified)
Waveform visualization with 40 breathing animation bars working perfectly
Metrics grid displays live stats (listeners_today, sources_online, signal_strength, network_load)
Navigation to dashboard works flawlessly via 'Oya, Play' button
News feed loads successfully with 10 articles displayed
Audio playback functionality - play buttons work and audio player appears
Dashboard sidebar navigation - all links (Morning Briefing, Voice Studio, Settings) functional
Page navigation between dashboard, briefing, voices, settings works correctly
Back navigation functionality works on all pages
Swiss Grid border system consistently applied throughout app
Mono UI font usage for labels and system text properly implemented
Color scheme consistency - primary (#EBD5AB), forest (#628141), background (#1B211A)
Terminal-style UI elements (blinking cursor, status indicators) working
Responsive design elements properly structured
Loading states display correctly with 'PROCESSING SIGNAL' indicator
Header elements (NARVO logo, system status, search button) present and functional
User profile section in sidebar displays correctly
Category tags and news article structure properly formatted

success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All UI elements, animations, navigation, and design system working perfectly
